name: The Adventures of Iommi & Tommy
description:
What is it?

It's our cooperative platform game for the Global Game Jam 2015. The story is about an Evil Pepper that controls the minds of your enemies. The protagonists , Tommy the tomato and Iommi the orange go in search of the Evil Pepper for free the magical garden.

How to play

  • Use mouse for select menu options.
  • Player 1: Move with A, D, and Spacebar to action.
  • Player 2: Move with left and right arrow, Enter to action.

Credits

Programmers:

  • Sergio Martín (@sermmor)
  • Eduardo Rodríguez (@eduardoAyuso)

Graphic Artist:

  • Francisco Javier Palma (@franjavipalma)

Sound Artist:

  • Oliver Moya Bueno (@Oli_mus)

More information about this game

Take a look to the website: http://globalgamejam.org/2015/games/adventures-iom...
